    Blog

    By Jonathan Nicholas

    About the site

    My name is Jonathan Nicholas, and I am a former information security consultant, turned pilot in training. If you wish, you can find out more About me.

    I embarked upon a career change that saw a decade long passion become a pursuit of a career. Over the past 5 years, I have been saving to follow my dream of becoming a commercial pilot and I am using this blog as a record embarking on the biggest challenge I have undertaken.

    I have created this website because I find that reflecting on experiences is an important way of learning from them.
    Furthermore, I want this website to be a resource to learn from where anyone else in similar shoes.

    Please check out my posts and write comments.

    Happy reading!
